E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/9/1974
Subject: Progress of Dick Davis
Dear Sir,
Dick Davis is hitting the ball well at A Reno Silver Sox!
He has an AVG of .276, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/10/1974
Subject: Progress of Leon Brown
Dear Sir,
Leon Brown has nothing more to prove at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .327 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
